meanings.definition: Improve the skills of (someone) through training or education.
meanings.sent1: She upskills her team by providing regular workshops and seminars.
meanings.sent2: He upskills himself by taking online courses and attending conferences.
meanings.sent3: The robot decided to upskills itself by downloading new software updates.
meanings.sent4: The young athlete upskills his game by practicing every day without fail.
meanings.sent5: The teacher upskills her teaching methods to keep her students engaged and motivated.

meanings.definition: The act of acquiring new skills or improving existing ones.
meanings.sent1: Continuous learning is essential for personal upskills and growth.
meanings.sent2: His upskills in coding landed him a well-paying job in a tech company.
meanings.sent3: The magician's upskills in card tricks never fail to impress his audience.
meanings.sent4: Her upskills in painting have made her artwork stand out among others.
meanings.sent5: The workshop aims to provide attendees with valuable upskills for their careers.
